physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a river taken in Buitenzorg (Bogor)
 Indonesia. In the background of the photo is a view of the Mount Salak. The photograph shows dense foliage on either side of the river
 with a small clearing at the bottom-left of the photograph. The edges of the photograph are curved. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a river taken in Buitenzorg (Bogor), Indonesia. In the background of the photo is a view of the Mount Salak. The photograph shows dense foliage on either side of the river, with a small clearing at the bottom-left of the photograph. The edges of the photograph are curved. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
